entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
